plot outline: When Saroja proposes marriage to Rahul after four years of a blooming relationship, he reveals that he got engaged to another girl and prefers an extramarital affair. Angered by his audacity, Saroja decides to take matters into her hands and avenge his nonchalance in a manner least expected.
title: Ondu Ghanteya Kathe
plot: After four years of committed relationship Rahul dumps Saroja, angered by his audacity she takes matters into own hands, literally.

When Saroja proposes marriage to Rahul after four years of a blooming relationship, he reveals that he got engaged to another girl and prefers an extramarital affair. Angered by his audacity, Saroja decides to take matters into her hands and avenge his nonchalance in a manner least expected.
